item.description:

item.title: Fly tipping on Milton gardens estate, 18th December
item.description:
Fly dipping on Milton garden estate since August 2025. Reported to Housing officer but no action taken. Rodents and foxes are now all over the estate. Drugs spotted within the fly tipping.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Milton Gardens Estate, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Foliage blocking light on footpath, 18th December
item.description:
There has been a report about foliage blocking light from a street lamp which illuminates the footpath between Durban Rd and Cedars Rd. Most of the foliage has been removed except for a small high overhang which although is quite far from the lamp mantle still partially blocks the beam of light which falls between the houses. Can this small overhang be removed pls? Additional lighting is not required here just a tall ladder and some clippers â€¦ thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Durban Road, Beckenham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
